name: Mawiri
description:
20 years ago, a brand-new element appeared in Port Moresby : the Goada Crystal. Its great source of energy helped the city to grow rapidly and to become energetically independent. This sudden change did not only arouse the interest of researchers and believers... 

A so-called pirate gang, the Wonky Wavers, quickly got their hands on Port Moresby’s greatest resource by devious means... 

Young Mawiri’s desire to help her people drives her to beat the pirates at their own game : sea races.

- Land and sea exploration of Port Moresby 

- 9 different relics to equip 

- 15 races against the Wonky Wavers 

- 6 different skins for the Dragonfly 

- A world filled with short dialogues

GAME ARTISTS

Jin ARAZI-BERTHET | Margot BÉRIC | Davide IGNUTI | Srijan MAHARJAN | Camille ROUSSET | Noah SAMBOU | Valentine SEROT | François SOURICHANH

GAME DESIGNERS

Jérémy BECICA | Mathilde CONTE | Thomas DEMISELLE | Dilane PETROVIC | Thibaut SOWA | Gabin VERGÈS

GAMEPLAY PROGRAMMERS

Julien CAGNONCLE | Pierre Louis Cukerman | Sébastien GONET | William Mota Gomes
